Building a Full Screen Top Shelf Extensi.title: Building a Full Screen Top Shelf Extension

abstract.text: Highlight content from your Apple TV application by building a full screen Top Shelf extension.

Supporting Multiple Users in Your tvOS A.title: Supporting Multiple Users in Your tvOS App

abstract.text: Store separate data for each user with the new Runs as Current User capability.

Mapping Apple TV Users to App Profiles.title: Mapping Apple TV Users to App Profiles

abstract.text: Adapt the content of your app for the current viewer by using TV user manager.
